# [Interview #1052: WOR Signing Table Q&A, Entry #40](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=1052#40)

#### Question

With the ten books split into five and five, is that going to be chronological?

#### Brandon Sanderson

Yes. They will be chronological.
